div.p:
Curia gilde burgi de Aberdene' tenta per consiliarios burgi predicti in pretorio eiusdem die
decimo septimo mensis Januarij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quadragesimo octauo

Quhilk day wes chosin be the hale consale and Communite gilbert meigneis Duncane' of
Clat Jhone' yong of scrogs and mathow fichet til ordanyt and se how ilke man of this
burgh sal be bodyne anent the apparande wer' tocum of Inglis men the quhilk to do
lelely and treuly the forsaid personis has sworn' the gret ath' with out fraud or gile

Item it is ordanit that a man of ilke craft sal sytt with the forsaid personis quhile thai
of his craft be taxt and ordanit eftir the ordinance of the forsaid personis

And als at the out burgez be warnyt til day and til vndirly the ordinance of the
said personis lyk as dois the inburgez / And this tobe done' vndir al the hiest pane'
that thai inryne' and tyne' agaynnis the kingis maieste and this burgh'

Curia gilde huius burgi tenta per prepositum et decanum gilde vltimo die mensis Januarij
Anno supradicto /

The quhilke dai it was auisit concludit and ordanit be the maste parte of the
brethir' of gilde of this burgh' / for the commoune gude and avale of merchandis'
that al maner of man that ladis ony merchand gudez owte of this burgh' in flaundris
sal mak fraght' hamwartis in the schippes to be frachtit to this burgh'
nyghbor'like / that is to say at the leste for three sekis owtwarte twa
tonnes hamewartis / And of othir' gudes Right' swa be the valu . / bath' of fische
and of hidis

Item at ilke Rais' thar' salbe twa of the worthiaste merchandis that sailis chosin
be the commoune counsaile of this burgh' / quhilkis sal haue powar' vndir the
Seel of the toune / to mak the said statute be execute as afferis / alsweil
of gudis set vp at the merkate / as othiris

Item at thaa twa merchandis and nane othiris sal by with' avis' of the Remanaunt
of the merchandis / al the salt that salbe boght' to this toune / And at thai
sal gerr' the maister of the schip in propre persoune stand by and Ressaue the
salt / quh and quhat tyme that he cummys heir' he sal or euer he loss' ony
gudis entir be his grete ath' to the dene of the gilde how mykill salt
he Ressauit / in his schip / And he sal keip and vndirly the salt quhil it be
deliuerit at the key / And of the salt that he deliueris he sal haue fracht'
and of namar'

Item that al the Remanant of the merchandis that sailis / sal obey honestli and
vndirly the forsaid twa merchandis in frachting of schippes and al maner of othir'
thingis vndir the payne

Item quhat euer he be that dois the contrar' and brekis ony of thir' statutis
sal pay to the kirk werk of this burgh' v lib' vnforgiffin / and
give he fautis in fracht he sal pay neuer the les' Idil fraght'

It is ordanit and statute be the hale counsaile and o mony of the brethir'
of the gilde / for defens of the toune and invading quhilkis apperis
of Inglismen / that the Aldirman and the dene of the gilde / with'
othir' discreit persounes quhilkis thai wil tak to thaim / sal ordane and
prouide waijs and mak actis and statutis for defens' of the toune as
thaim think speidfull /

Duodecimo die mensis Junij Anno Domini et cetera xlixno / In presencia Johannis de fife prepositj
et Duncani de clat decani gilde ac Andree Alaneson' vnius balliuorum ac diuersorum de consilio huius burgi videlicet gilbertj meignes
Johannis de Scrogs patris Johannis de marr' thome blyndseil / Andree ayncroft / andree
meignes thome Kintor Willelmi voket Edmundi louson' Johannis howison' Johannis
blyndseil Robertj Wormet et Alexandri Cryne personaliter comparens Andreas'
de Tulidef procurator et procuratorio nomine Ricardi de camera burgensis huius burgi
prout de sue procurationis mandato / per suas litteras patentes ibidem ostensas et perlectas
satis constabat virtute eiusdem procuracionis et quarumdem literarum resignacionis
eiusdem Ricardi de camera suo eciam sigillo sigillato / quandam piscariam tercie
partis Rethis de ly mydchingill aque de Dee in manibus prefati prepositi nomine
communitatis in fauorem murthaci de glaster tunc presentis pure et simpliciter per
fustem et baculum sursum reddidit ac pure et simpliciter resignauit q ac totum
Jus et Juris clameum de in dicta piscaria virtute et vigore assedacionis
sibi facte per communitatem de eadem habuit vel habere potuit pro se et heredibus
et assignatis suis quibuscumque quietum clamauit imperpetuum . / Quo peracto
prefatus prepositus cum consensu et auisamento concilij antedicti eandem piscariam cum pertinenciis
predicto murthaco dedit assedauit et assignauit adeo libere et quiete sicut
dictus Ricardus aut alij convicini huius burgi piscarias eiusdem die presenti tenuerunt
et possiderunt .

p.hi:
Burgenses et confratres gilde facti tempore Prepositure
Johannis fife Anno Domini M iiijC xlixno .

div.p: Magister Alexander de Guthery ex gracia consilij receptus est prestito Juramento et cetera
Alexander de Sanchar' similiter ex gracia consilij receptus fuit prestito solito Juramento
Archibaldus tulach' leiche similiter ex gracia consilij receptus fuit prestito solito Juramento

Johannes de glenralvyle' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ad
instanciam Johannis Rede ex gracia Consilij et quod Idem Johannes habebit vnam terram infra
limites dicti burgi infra annum et diem pro quinque solidis

Magister Arnaldus hyer receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ex gracia
Consilij pro quinque solidis et pro suis Consiliis auxiliis et supplemento dicto burgo pro toto
tempore vite sue impendendis
Johannes de ketnes receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem pro xx s' et cetera

Nono die mensis Augusti / Anno Domini et cetera xlixno gilbert meignes Androw meignes
Johnne of scrogs and androw ayncroft for a quartar' / Duncane clat Robert blyndseil
Johnne of marr' and patrik badenach' for a quartar' / matheu fichet Johnne henrison'
Culane Androw childe and Johnne scherar' Dunbanane for a quartar' / And
Johnne howison' thomas blyndseil William rolland and laurence thomson'
for the feird quartar' / has ordanit and made furth' Dauid meignes
in flandris in al haste to by a schipfull of salt and fracht' a schip
to this burgh' of abirdene / and for til bynd thaim til ladyng of the
sammyn schip / as him think best and maste speidfull / for the quhilkis
labour' thai haue promist to the said Dauid til e his expens' four'
pundes grete / of the moneth' of flaundris // And because that the
forsaid merchandes desirit and procurit the commoune Seel o that the
said Dauid myght' haue a commission' of the hale toune and vndre
the secrete Seel / Thai haue obliste thaim / that thai sall keip the toune
and the commounes harmlace and scathlas of al and sundri thingis
that the said Dauid sal do or bynd vertu of the said commission'

Duodecimo die mensis Septembris Anno Domini et cetera xlixno // magna pars consilij
Maior pars confratrum gilde huius burgi matura deliberacione consensierunt et
deliberauerunt / pro vtilitate tocius communitatis huius burgi quod Johannes de fife prepositus
Duncanus clat gilbertus meignes / Johannes de marr' Johannes de scrogs pater A
Andreas Alaneson' et patricius badenach' / habeant commissionem sub sigillo
Communi // cum omnimoda facultate ad decernendi et determinandi super solucione
antique Reste summe debite de financia quondam Regis Jacobi primi // et dubia
et questiones eiusdem declarandi // necnon terras annuos redditus et possessiones
defunctorum debencium de eadem vendendi et alienandi et generaliter omniam alia et cetera

Nomina consilij in tempore assedacionis de garne Richardo de ruthirfurde videlicet
Johannes scrogs filius prepositus Villelmus scherar' Duncanus clat decanus murthacus thomas
blindsel glastre patricius badenach' balliui Johannes Kymdy sch stephanus balrony Willelmus
thomas blendseil rolande Johannes hovysoun Alexander blendsel et Johannes scherar' de Dunbanene
qui concedebant sibi sicut prius fuerat pro vij annis preteritis et cetera erit concessum penultima
die mensis Januarij Anno et cetera xlixo
Eodem die scheley assidatur Johannii scrogs et preposito pro vij annis

Et eodem die rubislaw Assedabatur Johanni henrisoun pro iiij annis cum consensu
consilij antedicti / testibus supradictis eisdem

Sexto die mensis februarij Anno supradicto terre de bogfarlach' Assedatur Simonj blabre
ad terminum quatuor annorum quolibet anno pro liij s' et iiij d' plegio.

xvj die marcij Anno supradicto heslihede assedatur Alexandro Kintor ad terminum
quatuor annorum quolibet anno pro liij s' iiij d' plegio

Curia gilde tenta in pretorio eiusdem die decimo mensis Octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo
quadragesimo Nono /

JoanneThis is a later (seventeenth-century?) addition. Scrogs preposito / et Duncano de Clatt decano gilde
ut patet in Curia subsequente alterius paginae

The quhilk day it wes ordanit be hal Consale with the consent of the merchandis of this burgh'
that ilke merchande man that sendis gud to brugez sal gif in the honor' of god and Sanct Nicolace
our patron' that is to say iiij gret of ilke sek of woll and iiij g' of the clath of skynnis'
and j g' of ilke barrell and a gret of ilke dacr' of hidis And this tobe disponit vpon'
the reparacion of the parise kirk of Sanct Nicolace And of ilk barrell that passis out of
this burgh' to the firth or yet ony othir place j d' of the barrell tobe disponit as is
forsaid And this wes gravntit with ane assent And tobe put vndir the Comon' Sele and
for a iiij yher' til endur' quhil thai be better avisit

Item it wes concludit that ilk day that al thai that occupiit the comon' loch thai sal red it
and be redy in tyme' of yher with spadis and schulis and othir Instrumentis for the reparacion' of it
Eodem die electio decani gilde continuata fuit vsque p ad proximam curiam gilde.
